name: Avoid unreferenced Physical file  (DDS400)
description: This rule searches for all the unreferenced physical files.
output:
This report lists DDS400 unreferenced physical File.
It provides the following information:
DDS400 Physical File full name
rationale:
Unreferenced Physical files may be the symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance.

Warning:
Unreferenced code can also be the symptoms of missing code
remediation: Check if the unreferenced Physical files is not the symptom of missing code and if it is not the case, remove them.
remediationSample:
A corrosponding logical file should refer to a physical file. The syntax for referring a physcial file is:

A R EMPREC PFILE(EMPMSTL)
total: Total number of DDS400 Physical File

qualityStandards.name: Unreachable Named Callable or Method Control Element
